Not until devs fix skill based match making. When i casually pick up the game every once and a while and are placed against people with HUNDREDS of hours, while I have around 80, you know somethings wrong. Not to mention the player base is wayyy to obsessed with how good they are. Can't be their fault that they got placed against someone that doesn't really know what their doing. Seriously, I've never seen a more garbage match making system. Either I am placed against people with <30 hours, or I am placed against people that have played it for hundreds. Garbage system. Garbage devs. Money grabbers. Uninstalled.

Игра крутая. Но у неё комьюнити каких-то нытиков. То сурвы ноют что их закемпили, когда вместо того, чтобы всем селом идти спасать чела, могли давно завести гены и сбежать. Среди манов тоже встречаются индивиды, которые жалуются на генраш, но при этом по 30 минут гоняют я за супер мансером, вместо того, чтобы дать хит и оставить на едине со своей раной (чел хилится=чел не заводит гены)
В заключении хочу сказать, что игра абуеная и не стоит слушать нытиков, которые играют по фану, и жалуются на проигрыш.

ЙОУЙОУЙОУ!!! ДОБРО ПОЖАЛОВАТЬ В [b]DEAD BY DAYLIGHT[/b]! В обитель токсичных миазмов и горящих([b]И горячих тоже(*¯︶¯*)[/b]) жоп!!
В место, где каждый вправе установить [b]свои правила[/b], но лишь по правилам [b]сильнейшего[/b] будут играть остальные!
В место, где порой [b]жертвой[/b] становится сам(а) [b]убийца[/b]..
Не буду писать про призрачный баланс, про ставшие уже родными баги, а также про колючее коммьюнити.
Ведь есть тема куда серьёзнее.. А именно:
[b] Здесь уже есть прототип Kiss my аss(Тибэг), так почему бы не добавить средний палец?[/b] Иногда прям так и хочется показать его некоторым наглым мордам(Я сейчас говорю не только насчёт манов, но и насчёт так называемых "тиммейтов"). 
[b]***[/b]
Специально для новичков(и для тех, кто уже просто выгорел):
Постарайтесь найти опытных друзей и тренироваться с ними(как навык мансерства, так и погони за сурвом) хотя бы в самом начале. Смотрите туториалы на ютубе, изучайте руководства в стим и подкрепляйте полученные знания практикой. Ведь если вы ничего не умеете и прячетесь по кустам от любого шороха(И то, чаще всего неудачно), а также падаете через десять секунд от начала погони(Или не можете догнать ни одного сурва), комфортной игры не ждите. А вообще, всё придёт с опытом. Так что особо не парьтесь и просто помните, что через это проходил каждый из нас. Как бы банально это ни звучало, каждое ваше поражение - шаг к успеху.
[b](А ещё, не забывайте, что дбд это чистой воды рандом. Так что иногда всё может пойти не по плану, хотите вы этого или нет:)). [/b]

Before you judge, I have around 700 hours on my main account for DBD, so don't think my lack of hours means lack of expertise.

In my opinion, DBD has lost its "Spark".
Should you enjoy this game currently, enjoy it while it lasts.
People looking to purchase this game, think twice before the investment of not only your money, but time and willpower too.
Who knows, maybe one day in the future DBD will have an alright game health, but that is not today and we should be living in the present, not living on the hopes that it gets better eventually.

I can no longer make excuses for Behaviour.

The past few patches have been consistently poor; in both quality and balance. Survivors continue to get stronger and stronger against fun killers and BHVR keeps pushing out the same mid-range anti-loop trash killers that require so little skill that playing against them is miserable and playing as them is boring. In the latest dev Q&A behavior acknowledged that the current hell-scape has no end in sight and the game is going to continue it's downward spiral until they finally reach bankruptcy.  BHVR continues to double down on their 'Skinner' from the Simpsons bit and disregarding community outcry in favor of their own vision and misleading data. 

I sucked it up when Spirit was busted for years, I sucked it up when deathslinger was neutered with nothing  to make up for it, I sucked it up when ruin was nerfed, I sucked it up when mori's were nerfed and keys were left OP for an entire year, I sucked it up when they re-added infinites with the caveat of 'breakable walls'. I sucked it up when Blight's collision was broken for the 900th time. I sucked it up when hillbilly was given overheat for no other reason than 'we felt like it.', I sucked it up when the map reworks were no more than a graphic update (which i do appreciate) but then they added infinites with breakable walls. 

The game is now plagued with cheaters, survivor has gone from slightly stronger than killer to downright oppressive (at high ranks, with good perks/items) , MMR has made no difference to killers who were good enough to win 90% of their games anyway, made playing survivor at high MMR unbearably boring with 90% of matches being the same 3 killers, and no matter how much people complain or feedback BHVR has proven time, and time again, they do not care.

Please do not buy this game. It will suck you in with it's insane grind, weird-ass community, and backwards-thinking dev team. You will regret having this game.

**6/8/2022 Edit**
After posting this review I was inundated with said 'weird-ass community' members who would go to my profile and leave comments berating me for leaving my honest opinion of the game. Unfortunately, this only proves my point further that the community isn't anything to invest yourself into.

I love this game, and I love this community, and have been playing on and off in one form or another since the beta. That being said every update or patch I feel like the devs take one step forward and then immediately sprint in the opposite direction deaf to what the community has to say. I'm honestly conflicted cause I love this game and the concept and have been a huge fan since launch, but just the amount of confusion and miscommunication at this point is such a meme that I struggle not to doubt their intentions and I stop myself from setting my expectations too high (which at this point is pretty low). I genuinely hope the best for this game and for Behavior, I'm just sadly skeptical they'll do much or listen.

Un juego PvP asimetrico (1 asesino vs 4 supervivientes). Posiblemente, el mejor en su genero.

*Cada asesino es muy original (tanto en diseño como en mecanicas).
*Los diseños de supervivientes y escenarios son geniales.
*Los personajes invitados suman mucho al juego.
*La mayoria de las mecanicas de progreso son buenas (desde como conseguir habilidades, hasta poder conseguir la mayoria de los personajes solo jugando).
*Actualizaciones constantes que mantienen vivo al juego (eventos, premios, etc).

*El emparejamiento es basura (mas parece que son al azar, recien iniciados con gente de mas de 3000 hs)
*Los hackers abundan, 1 de cada 10/15 partidas te cruzas alguno.
*Cada actualizacion esta orientada a dar ventaja casi exclusivamente a los supervivientes.
*La comunidad es en extremo toxica.
*Tiene un sistema de censura en el chat hecho por idiotas (censura de texto en un juego +18).

En si es un buen juego, pero si vas a comprarlo mas te vale tener algun amigo que te ayude por lo cruel que es al principio.

In its current state, I honestly can't recommend this game. Well to be more accurate, if you're a hardcore gamer and especially a perfectionist, just stay away from this game - the grind is ridiculously huge! Just don't bother. BUT, if you wanna play very casually, I think I can say it's worth a shot.

The main reason is that the developers turned a chaotic fun game into a competitive sweatland! You won't get rewarded in this game if you play too well - trust me! Their motto says that "death is not an escape" yet it literally is! You escape too much and you're gonna have boring games - same if you kill a lot haha

Dead by daylight should not be a competitive game, so a skill-based matchmaking system, aka mmr, seems to be meaningless for it - not to mention that the system isn't even working properly!

Choice is yours!
